definition.name: Upload GitHub Pages artifact
definition.description: A composite action that prepares your static assets to be deployed to GitHub Pages
definition.author: GitHub

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Path of the directory containing the static assets.

inputs.name: retention-days
inputs.description: Duration after which artifact will expire in days.

outputs.name: artifact_id
outputs.description: The ID of the artifact that was uploaded.
